name: DJ Dado
description: '''DJ Dado''' (born '''Flavio Daddato''', 6 January 1967) is an [[Italian people|Italian]] [[disc jockey]] and [[record producer]] who is mostly known for his [[remix]] of [[Mark Snow]]'s theme for ''[[X-Files]]'', and for [[cover version|covering]] [[Giorgio Moroder]]'s "The Legend Of Babel". He produced [[dream trance]] and [[italo dance]] music between 1994 and 2004, and has done many remixes for other artists such as [[Boy George]], [[Jean-Michel Jarre]], and Italian singer [[Alexia (Italian singer)|Alexia]].
